original_text: Then the Lord's Spirit came with power to Jahaziel as he stood among the people. Jahaziel was a Levite, a descendant of Asaph. He was the son of Zechariah, who was the son of Benaiah, who was the son of Jeiel, who was the son of Mattaniah.
korean_text: 여호와의 영이 회중 가운데에서 레위 사람 야하시엘에게 임하셨으니 그는 아삽 자손 맛다냐의 현손이요 여이엘의 증손이요 브나야의 손자요 스가랴의 아들이더라

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord's Spirit came with power
as he stood among the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 백성 가운데 서 있을 때

sentences.original_text: He was the son of Zechariah
who was the son of Benaiah
who was the son of Jeiel
who was the son of Mattaniah
